name: Space game without a name
description:
A space game in a very raw state. Right now you can only fly around, mine and pull ore to your ship.

A, S, W, D to move.
1 - Laser, mine  on/off 
2 - Tractor beam on/off

I dont really know in what direction i should take this. Go towards a more arcade feel with enemy swarms or maybe more laid back mining. Maybe pulling ore around, build upgrades etc.
